Looking at the marriage of loved one.#@문장구분# He dosent know why, but he broke up with her my friend and her brother told me.#@문장구분# who broke up because he dosent know Spanish.#@문장구분#
he knew Spanish and he confess in Spanish to her, but he couldnt understanding the meanding of her presenet.#@문장구분#
found of later Thats what in mean to take me with it, but he didnt know meaning and couldnt take her.#@문장구분#
heartbreaking story between a man aod woman.#@문장구분#
